text: Abraham de Jesús Torres Nilo (born August 13, 1992 in León, Guanajuato) is a Mexican professional footballer who currently plays for Los Angeles Force in the National Independent Soccer Association. He made his professional debut with Pachuca during a scoreless Copa MX draw against Atlante on 29 August 2012. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:C.F. title: Abraham Torres Nilo
